Posts.Content: hiya, Karen! welcome to the group. i only had a lumpectomy but i have had chemo. i shaved my head on my first day because it was very long and i would have gone nuts watching it fall out. i'm glad all is well for you so far. you'll find that someone here will be able to answer just about any question you have whether they have your same story or not. God bless. Vicki :)
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed and now just memories of my left boob

Posts.Content: sorry for more surgery but hopefully this will help. i'll be praying for you, too. God bless. Vicki :)
Posts.Title: implant removed

Posts.Content: hiya, Tara, glad you are feelng well enough to travel again. have fun and be safe! God bless. Vicki :)
Posts.Title: Just a note
